pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:0.5: 71. The training rule on unmarried girls
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.2: At that time the nuns were giving the full admission to unmarried girls less than twenty years old.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.3: They were unable to endure cold and heat; hunger and thirst; contact with horseflies, mosquitoes, wind, the burning sun, and creeping animals and insects; rude and unwelcome speech;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.4: and they were unable to bear up with bodily feelings that are painful, severe, sharp, and destructive of life.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.5: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.6: “How can nuns give the full admission to unmarried girls less than twelve years old?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.7: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.11: An unmarried girl less than twenty years old is unable to endure cold and heat; hunger and thirst; contact with horseflies, mosquitoes, wind, the burning sun, and creeping animals and insects; rude and unwelcome speech;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.12: and she’s unable to bear up with bodily feelings that are painful, severe, sharp, and destructive of life.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.13: But an unmarried girl who is twenty years old is able to endure these things.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.15: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.16: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:1.17.1: ‘If a nun gives the full admission to an unmarried girl who is less than twenty years old, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.5: Who is less than twenty years old:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.6: who has not reached twenty years of age.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.8: a novice nun is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.11: If, intending to give the full admission, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a monastic boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.12: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.13: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.14: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.15: and the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.16.1: If the girl is less than twenty years old, and she perceives her as less, and she gives her the full admission, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.17: If the girl is less than twenty years old, but she is unsure of it, and she gives her the full admission, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.18: If the girl is less than twenty years old, but she perceives her as more, and she gives her the full admission, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.19: If the girl is more than twenty years old, but she perceives her as less, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.20: If the girl is more than twenty years old, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.21: If the girl is more than twenty years old, and she perceives her as more, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.23: if she gives the full admission to a girl less than twenty years old, but she perceives her as more;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.24: if she gives the full admission to a girl more than twenty years old, and she perceives her as more;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.26: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc71:2.27: The first training rule is finished.
